entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0150.9877] The disclosure 9954514 - Disclosure - Segment Reporting (Segment Reporting Information, By Segment) (Details) includes an inconsistent addition of a dimensional member. The value of the concept us-gaap:Revenues represents the sum of business segment members with a total of 39,744,000,000. The value of the total should be equal to the sum of the values of the business segments with a value of 40,980,000,000. The values for the component dimensions are as follows:
Reported Segment member us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=us-gaap:CorporateAndOtherMember with a value of 1,744,000,000. Reported Segment member us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=tsn:ChickenMember with a value of 12,174,000,000. Reported Segment member us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=tsn:PorkMember with a value of 4,465,000,000. Reported Segment member us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=tsn:BeefMember with a value of 15,218,000,000. Reported Segment member us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=tsn:PreparedFoodsMember with a value of 7,379,000,000.
The addends are calculated based on the member on the StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis.
Total Element : us-gaap:Revenues Total Value : 39,744,000,000 Total period : 2023-10-01 to 2024-06-29 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9877 Rule version: 26.0.9 - tsn-20240629.htm 8
